  <script type="text/javascript">
   // =============================================================================
// Function Class: Show/Hide product promotions &amp; special offers link
// =============================================================================

function showElement(id) {
  var elm = document.getElementById(id);
  if (elm) {
    elm.style.visibility = 'visible';
    if (elm.getAttribute('name') == 'heroQuickPromoDiv') {
      elm.style.display = 'block';
    }
  }
}
function hideElement(id) {
  var elm = document.getElementById(id);
  if (elm) {
    elm.style.visibility = 'hidden';
    if (elm.getAttribute('name') == 'heroQuickPromoDiv') {
      elm.style.display = 'none';
    }
  }
}
function showHideElement(h_id, div_id) {
  var hiddenTag = document.getElementById(h_id);
  if (hiddenTag) {
    showElement(div_id);
  } else {
    hideElement(div_id);
  }
}

function setCSMReq(a){
    a=a.toLowerCase();
    var b=CSMReqs[a];
    if(b&amp;&amp;--b.c==0){
        if(typeof uet=='function'){uet(a);};
        if(b.e){amznJQ.completedStage(b.e);};
        if(typeof P != 'undefined'){P.register(b.p);};
    }
}

    var b=CSMReqs[marker];
    if(b.c == 0){

            ue.tag(customtag);

    }

;(function(_onerror){
  var old_error_handler = _onerror;
  var attributionMap = {
          "NavJS":{
            files: [
              /^https?:\/\/(\S+\.)*images-amazon\.com(\S+\/)*Nav/
            ]
          },

            files: [

            ]
          },

            files: [
		/^https?:\/\/(\S+\.)*images-amazon\.com(\S+\/)*simsMerged/
            ]
           },
	  "Csm": {
	    files: [
		/^https?:\/\/(\S+\.)*images-amazon\.com(\S+\/)*csm/
	    ]
	  },
          "BrowserAddon":{
            logLevel: "ERROR",
            files:[
                /^res:\/\//, 
                /^resource:\/\//, /^chrome:\/\//, 
                /^chrome-extension:\/\//, /^extensions\//, 
                /^file:\/\/\//, /^chrome\/RendererExtensionBindings/, 
                /^plugin\/amazon_com_detail\.js/, 
                /^miscellaneous_bindings/, 
              
                // plugin in china
                /^http.?:\/\/(\S+\.)*qhimg\.com/, 
              
                // plugin in India
                /^http.?:\/\/(\S+\.)*datafastguru\.info/,

                /^http.?:\/\/sc1\.checkpoint\.com\/dev\/abine\/scripts\/inject\.js/,

                /^http.?:\/\/(\S+\.)*image2play\.com/,

                /^http.?:\/\/(\S+\.)*wajam\.com/,

                /^http.?:\/\/(\S+\.)*ydstatic\.com/,

		/^https?:\/\/(\S+\.)*googleapis\.com\/ajax\/libs\/jquery/,

		/^https?:\/\/www\.superfish\.com\/ws/,

		/^https?:\/\/api.imideo.com\/v2/,

		/^https?:\/\/minibar.iminent.com/,

		/^https?:\/\/translate.googleusercontent.com/,
	
		/^includes\/helper/
            ]
          }
  };

    function findMatch(f){
	for(var attribution in attributionMap){
	    var i=0;
	    var attributionValue = attributionMap[attribution];
	    var files = attributionValue['files'];
	    while(files[i]){
		if(f.match(files[i])){
	            var exception={};
		    exception.attribution = attribution;
		    if(attributionValue.hasOwnProperty("logLevel")){
			exception.logLevel = attributionValue['logLevel'];	
		    }
		return exception;
           	}
		i++;
	    }
        }
	return null;
    }


    function dpOnErrorOverride(message, file, line, col, error){
     var matchingErrorFound = false;
     if(typeof file == "string"){
        try{
	    var jsException = findMatch(file);
	    if(jsException &amp;&amp; typeof jsException === "object"){
                jsException.m =  message;
                jsException.f = file;
                jsException.l = line;
                jsException.c =  "" + (col || "");
                jsException.err =  error;
                jsException.fromOnError = 1;
                jsException.args = arguments;
                if(window.ueLogError){
               	    window.ueLogError(jsException);
		    matchingErrorFound = true;
		    if(ue &amp;&amp; ue.count){
		        ue.count("dpJavascriptAffectedErrors", (ue.count("dpJavascriptAffectedErrors") || 0) + 1);
		        ue.count("dpJSError" + jsException.attribution, (ue.count("dpJSError" + jsException.attribution) || 0) + 1);
		    }
	        }
            }
	}catch(exception){
	    if(window.ueLogError){
	        window.ueLogError(exception,{message: "dpOnErrorOverride: error occurred - ", logLevel:"FATAL"});
	    }
	}
    }
	if(!matchingErrorFound){ 
          old_error_handler.apply(this, arguments);
	}
        return false;
    }

      dpOnErrorOverride.skipTrace = 1;
      window.onerror = dpOnErrorOverride;
    })(window.onerror);
  </script>

"   ,   "   n   o   t   -   l   o   g   g   e   d   -   i   n   "   :   "   P   l   e   a   s   e       s   i   g   n       i   n       t   o       e   n   t   e   r       a       p   r   o   m   o   t   i   o   n       c   o   d   e       o   r       g   i   f   t       c   a   r   d   .                                                    d   i   s   p   l   a   y   :       n   o   n   e   ;   
                                   }   
                                   #   s   p   i   n   n   e   r   I   m   a   g   e       {   
                                                   d   i   s   p   l   a   y   :       b   l   o   c   k   ;   
                                                   m   a   r   g   i   n   -   l   e   f   t   :       a   u   t   o   ;   
                                                   m   a   r   g   i   n   -   r   i   g   h   t   :       a   u   t   o   ;   
                                   }   
                                   .   h   i   d   d   e   n       {   
                                                   d   i   s   p   l   a   y   :       n   o   n   e   ;   
                                   }   
   /   s   t   y   l   e   &gt;

                   d   i   v       i   d   =   "   t   e   l   l   A   F   r   i   e   n   d   B   y   l   i   n   e   B   o   x   _   f   e   a   t   u   r   e   _   d   i   v   "       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   f   e   a   t   u   r   e   "       d   a   t   a   -   f   e   a   t   u   r   e   -   n   a   m   e   =   "   t   e   l   l   A   F   r   i   e   n   d   B   y   l   i   n   e   B   o   x   "   &gt;   
   
   
   
   
                   
   
                   
                   
                   
                                   
                                                   
   
   
       
   
   
   
   
   
   
   d   i   v       i   d   =   "   t   e   l   l   -   a   -   f   r   i   e   n   d   "       d   a   t   a   -   c   l   o   s   e   =   "   C   l   o   s   e   "       d   a   t   a   -   d   e   s   t   =   "   /   g   p   /   p   d   p   /   t   a   f   /   d   p   P   o   p   .   h   t   m   l   /   r   e   f   =   c   m   _   s   w   _   p   _   v   i   e   w   _   d   p   _   I   O   .   O   v   b   0   G   V   F   4   E   N   ?   i   e   =   U   T   F   8   &amp;a   m   p   ;   r   e   d   i   r   e   c   t   L   o   c   a   t   i   o   n   =   d   p   %   2   F   B   0   0   A   W   U   9   W   5   W   %   2   F   %   2   3   _   s   w   f   t   e   x   t   _   S   w   f   &amp;a   m   p   ;   i   s   E   m   a   i   l   =   0   &amp;a   m   p   ;   p   l   a   c   e   m   e   n   t   I   D   =   d   p   _   I   O   .   c   o   n   t   e   n   t   T   y   p   e   =   a   s   i   n   &amp;a   m   p   ;   i   s   D   y   n   a   m   i   c   S   W   F   =   0   &amp;a   m   p   ;   c   o   n   t   e   n   t   I   D   =   B   0   0   A   W   U   9   W   5   W   &amp;a   m   p   ;   e   m   a   i   l   T   e   m   p   l   a   t   e   =   %   2   F   g   p   %   2   F   p   d   p   %   2   F   c   o   m   m   o   n   %   2   F   e   m   a   i   l   %   2   F   s   h   a   r   e   -   p   r   o   d   u   c   t   &amp;a   m   p   ;   i   s   D   P   X   =   1   &amp;a   m   p   ;   i   d   =   B   0   0   A   W   U   9   W   5   W   &amp;a   m   p   ;   r   a   =   t   a   f   &amp;a   m   p   ;   t   t   =   s   h   &amp;a   m   p   ;   v   i   a   A   c   c   o   u   n   t   =   a   m   a   z   o   n   &amp;a   m   p   ;   r   e   l   a   t   e   d   A   c   c   o   u   n   t   s   =   a   m   a   z   o   n   d   e   a   l   s   %   2   C   a   m   a   z   o   n   m   p   3   &amp;a   m   p   ;   f   o   r   c   e   S   p   r   i   t   e   s   =   1   &amp;a   m   p   ;   r   e   f   e   r   e   r   =   h   t   t   p   %   2   5   3   A   %   2   5   2   F   %   2   5   2   F   w   w   w   .   a   m   a   z   o   n   .   c   o   m   %   2   5   2   F   g   p   %   2   5   2   F   p   r   o   d   u   c   t   %   2   5   2   F   B   0   0   A   W   U   9   W   5   W   %   2   5   2   F   r   e   f   %   2   5   3   D   &amp;a   m   p   ;   c   o   n   t   e   n   t   U   R   I   =   %   2   F   d   p   %   2   F   B   0   0   A   W   U   9   W   5   W   "       d   a   t   a   -   t   i   t   l   e   =   "   S   h   a   r   e       t   h   i   s       i   t   e   m       v   i   a       E   m   a   i   l   "       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   a   -   s   e   c   t   i   o   n       a   -   t   e   x   t   -   c   e   n   t   e   r       a   -   s   p   a   c   i   n   g   -   s   m   a   l   l   "   &gt;                    s   p   a   n       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   a   -   d   e   c   l   a   r   a   t   i   v   e   "       d   a   t   a   -   a   c   t   i   o   n   =   "   a   -   m   o   d   a   l   "       d   a   t   a   -   a   -   m   o   d   a   l   =   "   {   &amp;q   u   o   t   ;   c   a   c   h   e   &amp;q   u   o   t   ;   :   &amp;q   u   o   t   ;   f   a   l   s   e   &amp;q   u   o   t   ;   ,   &amp;q   u   o   t   ;   w   i   d   t   h   &amp;q   u   o   t   ;   :   &amp;q   u   o   t   ;   4   8   0   &amp;q   u   o   t   ;   ,   &amp;q   u   o   t   ;   n   a   m   e   &amp;q   u   o   t   ;   :   &amp;q   u   o   t   ;   s   w   f   &amp;q   u   o   t   ;   ,   &amp;q   u   o   t   ;   u   r   l   &amp;q   u   o   t   ;   :   &amp;q   u   o   t   ;   /   g   p   /   p   d   p   /   t   a   f   /   d   p   P   o   p   .   h   t   m   l   /   r   e   f   =   c   m   _   s   w   _   p   _   v   i   e   w   _   d   p   _   I   O   .   c   o   n   t   e   n   t   T   y   p   e   =   a   s   i   n   &amp;a   m   p   ;   i   s   D   y   n   a   m   i   c   S   W   F   =   0   &amp;a   m   p   ;   c   o   n   t   e   n   t   I   D   =   B   0   0   A   W   U   9   W   5   W   &amp;a   m   p   ;   e   m   a   i   l   T   e   m   p   l   a   t   e   =   %   2   F   g   p   %   2   F   p   d   p   %   2   F   c   o   m   m   o   n   %   2   F   e   m   a   i   l   %   2   F   s   h   a   r   e   -   p   r   o   d   u   c   t   &amp;a   m   p   ;   i   s   D   P   X   =   1   &amp;a   m   p   ;   i   d   =   B   0   0   A   W   U   9   W   5   W   &amp;a   m   p   ;   r   a   =   t   a   f   &amp;a   m   p   ;   t   t   =   s   h   &amp;a   m   p   ;   v   i   a   A   c   c   o   u   n   t   =   a   m   a   z   o   n   &amp;a   m   p   ;   r   e   l   a   t   e   d   A   c   c   o   u   n   t   s   =   a   m   a   z   o   n   d   e   a   l   s   %   2   C   a   m   a   z   o   n   m   p   3   &amp;a   m   p   ;   f   o   r   c   e   S   p   r   i   t   e   s   =   1   &amp;a   m   p   ;   r   e   f   e   r   e   r   =   h   t   t   p   %   2   5   3   A   %   2   5   2   F   %   2   5   2   F   w   w   w   .   a   m   a   z   o   n   .   c   o   m   %   2   5   2   F   g   p   %   2   5   2   F   p   r   o   d   u   c   t   %   2   5   2   F   B   0   0   A   W   U   9   W   5   W   %   2   5   2   F   r   e   f   %   2   5   3   D   &amp;a   m   p   ;   c   o   n   t   e   n   t   U   R   I   =   %   2   F   d   p   %   2   F   B   0   0   A   W   U   9   W   5   W   &amp;q   u   o   t   ;   ,   &amp;q   u   o   t   ;   h   e   a   d   e   r   &amp;q   u   o   t   ;   :   &amp;q   u   o   t   ;   S   h   a   r   e       t   h   i   s       i   t   e   m       v   i   a       E   m   a   i   l   &amp;q   u   o   t   ;   }   "   &gt;   
                                   a       i   d   =   "   s   w   f   T   e   x   t   "       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   a   -   l   i   n   k   -   n   o   r   m   a   l       e   m   a   i   l   "       t   i   t   l   e   =   "   S   h   a   r   e       v   i   a       e   -   m   a   i   l   "       h   r   e   f   =   "   /   g   p   /   p   d   p   /   t   a   f   /   r   e   f   =   c   m   _   s   w   _   l   _   v   i   e   w   _   d   p   _   I   O   .   O   v   b   0   G   V   F   4   E   N   ?   i   e   =   U   T   F   8   &amp;a   m   p   ;   i   t   e   m   I   n   f   o   =   B   0   0   A   W   U   9   W   5   W   &amp;a   m   p   ;   p   l   a   c   e   m   e   n   t   I   D   =   d   p   _   I   O   .   O   v   b   0   G   V   F   4   E   N   &amp;a   m   p   ;   p   a   r   e   n   t   A   S   I   N   =   B   0   0   A   W   U   9   W   5   W   &amp;a   m   p   ;   c   o   n   t   e   n   t   N   a   m   e   =   i   t   e   m   &amp;a   m   p   ;   c   o   n   t   e   n   t   T   y   p   e   =   a   s   i   n   &amp;a   m   p   ;   i   s   D   y   n   a   m   i   c   S   W   F   =   0   &amp;a   m   p   ;   t   y   p   e   =   S   H   &amp;a   m   p   ;   c   o   n   t   e   n   t   I   D   =   B   0   0   A   W   U   9   W   5   W   &amp;a   m   p   ;   e   m   a   i   l   T   e   m   p   l   a   t   e   =   %   2   F   g   p   %   2   F   p   d   p   %   2   F   c   o   m   m   o   n   %   2   F   e   m   a   i   l   %   2   F   s   h   a   r   e   -   p   r   o   d   u   c   t   &amp;a   m   p   ;   i   s   D   P   X   =   1   &amp;a   m   p   ;   v   i   a   A   c   c   o   u   n   t   =   a   m   a   z   o   n   &amp;a   m   p   ;   r   e   l   a   t   e   d   A   c   c   o   u   n   t   s   =   a   m   a   z   o   n   d   e   a   l   s   %   2   C   a   m   a   z   o   n   m   p   3   &amp;a   m   p   ;   r   e   f   e   r   e   r   =   h   t   t   p   %   2   5   3   A   %   2   5   2   F   %   2   5   2   F   w   w   w   .   a   m   a   z   o   n   .   c   o   m   %   2   5   2   F   g   p   %   2   5   2   F   p   r   o   d   u   c   t   %   2   5   2   F   B   0   0   A   W   U   9   W   5   W   %   2   5   2   F   r   e   f   %   2   5   3   D   &amp;a   m   p   ;   c   o   n   t   e   n   t   U   R   I   =   %   2   F   d   p   %   2   F   B   0   0   A   W   U   9   W   5   W   "   &gt;   S   h   a   r   e   /   a   &gt;   s   p   a   n       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   a   -   l   e   t   t   e   r   -   s   p   a   c   e   "   &gt;   /   s   p   a   n   &gt;   
                           a       i   d   =   "   s   w   f   I   m   a   g   e   "       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   a   -   l   i   n   k   -   n   o   r   m   a   l       e   m   a   i   l   "       t   i   t   l   e   =   "   S   h   a   r   e       v   i   a       e   -   m   a   i   l   "       h   r   e   f   =   "   /   g   p   /   p   d   p   /   t   a   f   /   r   e   f   =   c   m   _   s   w   _   l   _   v   i   e   w   _   d   p   _   I   O   .   O   v   b   0   G   V   F   4   E   N   ?   i   e   =   U   T   F   8   &amp;a   m   p   ;   i   t   e   m   I   n   f   o   =   B   0   0   A   W   U   9   W   5   W   &amp;a   m   p   ;   p   l   a   c   e   m   e   n   t   I   D   =   d   p   _   I   O   .                    /   s   p   a   n   &gt;   
   
                   
                                   
                                   
                                                   
                                                   
                                                   a       d   a   t   a   -   h   e   i   g   h   t   =   "   4   0   0   "       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   a   -   l   i   n   k   -   n   o   r   m   a   l   "       t   a   r   g   e   t   =   "   _   b   l   a   n   k   "       t   i   t   l   e   =   "   S   h   a   r   e       o   n       F   a   c   e   b   o   o   k   "       h   r   e   f   =   "   /   g   p   /   r   e   d   i   r   e   c   t   .   h   t   m   l   /   r   e   f   =   c   m   _   s   w   _   c   l   _   f   a   _   d   p   _   I   O   .   O   v   b   0   G   V   F   4   E   N   ?   _   e   n   c   o   d   i   n   g   =   U   T   F   8   &amp;a   m   p   ;   l   o   c   a   t   i   o   n   =   h   t   t   p   %   3   A   %   2   F   %   2   F   w   w   w   .   f   a   c   e   b   o   o   k   .   c   o   m   %   2   F   s   h   a   r   e   .   p   h   p   %   3   F   u   %   3   D   h   t   t   p   %   2   5   3   A   %   2   5   2   F   %   2   5   2   F   w   w   w   .   a   m   a   z   o   n   .   c   o   m   %   2   5   2   F   d   p   %   2   5   2   F   B   0   0   A   W   U   9   W   5   W   %   2   5   2   F   r   e   f   %   2   5   3   D   c   m   _   s   w   _   r   _   f   a   _   d   p   _   I   O   .   O   v   b   0   G   V   F   4   E   N   &amp;a   m   p   ;   t   o   k   e   n   =   6   B   D   0   F   B   9   2   7   C   C   5   1   E   7   6   F   F   4   4   6   5   8   4   B   1   0   4   0   F   7   0   E   A   7   E   8   8   E   1   "   &gt;   i       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   a   -   i   c   o   n       a   -   i   c   o   n   -   s   h   a   r   e   -   f   a   c   e   b   o   o   k   "       a   r   i   a   -   l   a   b   e   l   =   "   F   a   c   e   b   o   o   k   "   &gt;   s   p   a   n       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   a   -   i   c   o   n   -   a   l   t   "   &gt;   F   a   c   e   b   o   o   k   /   s   p   a   n   &gt;   /   i   &gt;   /   a   &gt;   s   p   a   n       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   a   -   l   e   t   t   e   r   -   s   p   a   c   e   "   &gt;   /   s   p   a   n   &gt;   
                                   
                   
                                   
                                   
                                                   
                                                   
                                                   a       d   a   t   a   -   h   e   i   g   h   t   =   "   4   0   0   "       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   a   -   l   i   n   k   -   n   o   r   m   a   l   "       t   a   r   g   e   t   =   "   _   b   l   a   n   k   "       t   i   t   l   e   =   "   S   h   a   r   e       o   n       T   w   i   t   t   e   r   "       h   r   e   f   =   "   /   g   p   /   r   e   d   i   r   e   c   t   .   h   t   m   l   /   r   e   f   =   c   m   _   s   w   _   c   l   _   t   w   _   d   p   _   I   O   .                                                                                                    $   (   '   #   u   d   p   K   c   p   A   p   p   S   e   n   d   B   u   t   t   o   n   '   )   .   p   r   o   p   (   "   d   i   s   a   b   l   e   d   "   ,       f   a   l   s   e   )   ;   
                                                                                   }   
                                                                   }   )   ;   
   
                                                                   /   /   C   l   e   a   r       t   h   e       i   n   p   u   t       d   a   t   a   
                                                                   $   (   '   #   u   d   p   K   c   p   A   p   p   R   e   c   i   p   i   e   n   t   '   )   .   v   a   l   (   "   "   )   ;   
                                       }   
                   }   
                                                   
                   r   e   t   u   r   n       n   e   w       k   c   p   A   p   p   J   S   (   )   ;   
   }   )   ;

   d   i   v       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   a   -   r   o   w       a   -   s   p   a   c   i   n   g   -   b   a   s   e   "   &gt;   d   i   v       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   a   -   i   c   o   n   -   r   o   w       a   -   s   p   a   c   i   n   g   -   n   o   n   e   "   &gt;   a       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   a   -   l   i   n   k   -   n   o   r   m   a   l       a   -   t   e   x   t   -   n   o   r   m   a   l   "       t   i   t   l   e   =   "   5   .   0       o   u   t       o   f       5       s   t   a   r   s   "       h   r   e   f   =   "   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   w   w   w   .   a   m   a   z   o   n   .   c   o   m   /   M   y   -   D   a   y   -   H   e   a   v   e   n   -   L   i   l   -   S   i   s   t   e   r   -   e   b   o   o   k   /   p   r   o   d   u   c   t   -   r   e   v   i   e   w   s   /   B   0   0   A   W   U   9   W   5   W   /   r   e   f   =   c   m   _   c   r   _   d   p   _   s   y   n   o   p   /   1   8   9   -   1   1   3   0   8   1   1   -   6   1   4   5   3   1   4   ?
